pkgmetadata.longdescription: MUltifrontal Massively Parallel sparse direct Solver implements a direct solver for large sparse linear systems, with a particular focus on symmetric positive definite matrices. It can operate on distributed matrices e.g. over a cluster. It has Fortran and C interfaces, and can interface with ordering tools such as Scotch or Metis.

use.flag: Enable matrix ordering with METIS (sci-libs/metis, sci-libs/parmetis)
